freeze.name: freeze

flying.usage: allow you fly like in creative mode
flying.name: flying

disorder.name: disorder
disorder.approach: been cursed or attacked by some mobs

putrefy.usage: decrease you items' duration (all breakable item in inventory)
putrefy.additional: maybe the worst effect in this mod

talisman_conflict.additional: without tiger talisman in the pocket, you will be destoryed by talismans' power

gravity_plus.usage: increase gravity that will break you body and can't go higher
gravity_plus.additional: pay attention if you want to fight while flying

falling_protection.additional: maybe chicken talisman can make this as well

moon_walk.usage: create block under feet (walk in the air)
moon_walk.additional: what is this for if i can fly

leigod_grace.additional: emmm,will you have their drops with lighting?
leigod_grace.name: leigod_grace

nightmare.usage: decrease you max health and cannot sleep in a while
nightmare.name: nightmare

flower_grace.usage: bring you unstoppable power for a while and some chance
flower_grace.name: flower_grace

unlucky.usage: bad events are going to come to you
unlucky.name: unlucky

infection.usage: summon a revenger to help you to revenge
infection.name: infection
infection.approach: some mobs' skill or touch with heavy water
